intro.heading: Comprehensive biomarker testing at diagnosis can detect both actionable (eg, EGFR, ALK) and emerging biomarkers (eg, KRAS G12C)3
intro.text3: Consider testing eligible patients with NSCLC at diagnosis for KRAS10,11
intro.text8: ALK, anaplastic lymphoma kinase; EGFR, epidermal growth factor receptor; KRAS, Kirsten rat sarcoma; NGS, next-generation sequencing; NSCLC, non-small cell lung cancer; PCR, polymerase chain reaction.
